item.description:
My co-workers and I often to go to this place when we feel like getting our Margarita on.

My favorite is the prickly pear Margarita. I get it frozen and it hits the spot after a long work day.

So, join me to get your Margarita on!

I'll wear a green shirt. I'm asking everyone to wear something green, so it'll be easy to find the group. This works well when the majority of people do it. You don't have to wear a green shirt ... Just something green ... green tie, green purse, green scarf ... You get the gist of it.

There will be no group tab. Please maintain your own tab, or pay as you go. People will be arriving and leaving at different times, so a group tab does not work out well.

I'll get there between 5pm to 5:30pm. I'll stay for a couple of hours, but feel free to come and go as you please.

See ya there!

Cheers!

Lisa

check out this link for menu, http://www.zumatexmex...
item.how_to_find_us: I'm asking everyone to wear something green.
item.name: Zuma Tex-Mex Grill in Faneuil Hall - Wear Green
